verbose_text: These data suggest the existence of two different pathways, one dependent on SPI-1, NLRC4, and flagellin that triggers a robust activation of caspase-1 within minutes after infection, and a second pathway dependent on SPI-2 and NLRP3 that triggers the activation of caspase-1 with slower kinetics.
evidence: flagellin that triggers a robust activation of caspase-1
